CompartmentPackage

Class AbstractSpikingCompartment

  • java.lang.Object
    • CompartmentPackage.AbstractCompartment
      • CompartmentPackage.AbstractSpikingCompartment
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AxonHillock, SimpleLeaky

    public abstract class AbstractSpikingCompartment
extends AbstractCompartment
    Abstract spiking compartment underlying all compartments with an output.
    Author:
    lss

    • Method Detail

      • addOutgoingSynapse

        public void addOutgoingSynapse(double weight,
                               double delay,
                               SynapseForm stype,
                               AbstractSpikingCompartment fromCompartment,
                               AbstractCompartment toCompartment,
                               int ID,
                               double alpha)
        adds an outgoing synapse to this spiking compartment
        Parameters:
        weight - weight of synapse
        delay - delay in seconds
        stype - synapse type: EXCITATORY or INHIBITORY
        fromCompartment - presynaptic compartment of this synapse
        toCompartment - postsynaptic sompartment for this synapse
        ID - identity number
        alpha - alpha value for this synapse
